questions.text: You are watching a show about a political topic. Jeremy Clarkson appears on it to give his opinion. Do you:

answers.text: A: Become angered by his opinions and give the fact that he's been given a platform to air them.
B: Remain indifferent. You're not really paying attention. You'r just waiting for the next show
C: Find your self nodding in agreement to everything he's saying.

questions.text: You`re in a city centre. You see a 20 something man walking round wearing deep v t-shirt, skin tight fashin-ripped jeans and flip-flops. Your first thought is:

answers.text: A: Tool
B: Indifferent.
C: Great look, where`s the nearing Top Shop!

questions.text: You`re on holiday in a foreign contry and want to get something to eat. Do you:

answers.text: A: I don`t tend to traval abroad
B: Find somewhere interesting that serves the local food.
C: Make a beeline for the nearest Mc Donald`s.

questions.text: You`re driving and listening to the radio when a Bruno Mars song comes on. Which of the following do you do:

answers.text: A: Wonder if Bruno Mars is playing at the 02 any time soon.
B: Hmm along without really listening.
C: Immediately Turn the radio off, or over to a different channel.

questions.text: You`re in the centre of London - a capital city rich in culture and history. You walk by M&M world. Do you think:

answers.text: A: Just what I need an M&M towel / t-shirt / slippers / ashtray!
B: Why does London need an M&M World??
C: I'm not really a city person.

questions.text: You`re sat at home with your significant other and they are watching TOWIE. You think:

answers.text: A: This is bollocks
B: It's just something to have on.
C: This is great TV.

questions.text: You are in an art gallery with a contemporary art exhibition. Are you likely to think:

answers.text: A: It`s not all to my taste, but some of it`s interesting.
B: I`d never visit an art gallery..
C: Not for me. I think I prefer watercolours.

questions.text: When you see an image of Boris Johnson do you think:

answers.text: A: My god, how can this person be the UK`s Foreign Secretary - the person who`s supposed to represent the UK (a developed nation) around the world!
B: Excellent chap that Boris Johnson
C: Who`s Boris Johnson.

questions.text: You`re reading a Daily Mail article on the EU. Your thoughts are:

answers.text: A: I don`t read newspapers
B: Bloody foreiners, always trying to get into our country to steal our jobs and they don`t speak out language or understand our culture
C: Hang on... there`s no way I`d be reading the Daily Mail.

questions.text: It`s a royal wedding / birth / funeral. What`s your reaction:

answers.text: A: AMAZING, best news ever. I`m off to get a prime spot outside Buckingham Palace / Windsor Castle right now!
B: Day off work: PARTY TIME!
C: Great day for the country I suppose
